page.description: The WIN_MEMORY_INFO() function returns information about a computer's memory configuration.

argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer variable containing information about the memory configuration of a computer.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.r
